code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useLocation,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useProducts}from"../context/ProductContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditProduct=()=>{const{state}=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const{updateProduct}=useProducts();const[formData,setFormData]=useState((state===null||state===void 0?void 0:state.product)||{});const[error,setError]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!formData.name||!formData.price||!formData.image){setError("All fields are required.");return;}updateProduct(formData);navigate("/products");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"edit-product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Edit Product"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit})]});};export default EditProduct;
